item.title: Sample Private Post via e-mail.
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Good stuff… Did you know you can guest blog that? Send that kind of information with a good Title as the Subject line, and e-mail to private@vgoff.posterous.com and I will get notification of a private blog post, and will publish it after review and edit process. Code formatting can be done easily either by including a gist link, or by using markdown (I can give you the markdown instructions, but basically http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax) with the Ruby code blocks being able to be invoked by doing this:     #!ruby     def hello string       "Hello #{string}“     end

A Good Post about sending e-mail to posteroust to make a post For example, I am cc'ing this to Posterous as a private post, so that I can send you the link and we will see how it presents itself in this format (I won’t edit it) to fix any problems with it.
